movie.title: Hachi-ko
movie.plot: The tragic, true story about Hachikō, an Akita dog who was loyal to his master, Professor Ueno, even after Ueno's death.

events.title: British troops began their advance on Surabayu, in what is now celebrated in Indonesia as Heroes' Day

movie.title: Battle of Surabaya
movie.plot: Musa, who is only a thirteen-year-old shoe shiner, undergoes destiny through his adventure of waging war during the war time. Will he manage to bring peace among the troops who keep on fighting for nothing?

movie.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
movie.plot: A representative of an alien race that went through drastic evolution to survive its own climate change, Klaatu comes to Earth to assess whether humanity can prevent the environmental damage they have inflicted on their own planet. When barred from speaking to the United Nations, he decides humankind shall be exterminated so the planet can survive.
